title: Where can  i report a botted account?
body: Nothing more to say. Just found somone who played only arams without masteries and suddenly started to play ranked. I dont know if i can show the account, but where can i report it?

replies.body:
You can feel free to send us a report in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this.

If you have any other questions, let me know. ^.^
Thank you for the help, i sadly lost the Name of the player, but now i am informed for the next time.
